representation_information.name: A-Law telephony companding algorithm, from ITU-T G.711
representation_information.description: Standard companding algorithm used in European digital communications systems (telephones, for the most part) to optimize the dynamic range of an analog signal (generally a voice) for digitizing, i.e., to compress 16 bit LPCM (Linear Pulse Code Modulated) data down to 8 bits of logarithmic data.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
